amendatorysection.para: District No. 34 shall contain the counties of Merrick, Hamilton, and Nance, that part of Hall County which includes the precincts of Center 1, Center 2, Center 3, Center 5, Grand Island Fifteen False, Washington 1B and 1E, Doniphan, Washington 2, and Grand Island 23, and that part of Polk County not included in legislative district 24.
